channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Stock market today: Asian shares sink, weighed down by Wall St tech retreat, China policy questions
item.description: Shares have fallen in Asia after a broad washout across Wall Street dragged U.S. stocks lower. Hong Kong’s benchmark dipped more than 2% as investors remained wary over China’s plans for reviving its slowing economy.

item.title: Yoga, meditation and prayer: Urban transit workers cope with violence and fear on the job
item.description: Transit workers around the country are managing their fear and anxiety over a rise in violent crime on subways and buses.

item.title: Russia seeks 18-year sentence for US reporter on trial for spying in highly politicized legal system
item.description: Russian prosecutors are seking a prison sentence of 18 years for Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich.
